title: 6br/3ba ►REMODELED FLAT ON TWO-LEVELS!
posting_body: Please reply by email to this posting, or call
•Lease Duration: Long-term or short-term 1 Year Preferred
JUST REMODELED, a two-story flat in a private two-unit building with easy parking and unbeatable proximity to everything.
An A+ location on a serene one-way street where the Inner Mission meets Bernal Heights provides some of the best weather in San Francisco.
•REMODELED, TWO-STORY, VICTORIAN FLAT IN A TWO-UNIT, PRIVATE BUILDING!
•Prime location on the border of North Bernal Heights and Inner Mission
•Victorian Architecture, with high ceilings and desirable open floor plan
•Remodeled chef's kitchen with all stainless appliances
•Recessed and custom lighting throughout the home
•Large and sunny, shared yard for you and your pet

This renovated light-filled Victorian, full-floor flat is in one of the city's hippest neighborhoods North Bernal Heights near Precita Park and the border of the Inner Mission, surrounded by Victorian homes, on a quiet one-way street with easy parking.
A mecca for dog owners, up the block, there is a beautiful path to Bernal Hill; hiking, running, and a dog park with wraparound city views.
Trendy restaurants, shopping, and the nightlife of 24th Street and Valencia Street Gourmet Ghetto are within walking distance from your new home.
Commuters' dream, BART station, is six blocks away, and public transportation is everywhere.
Three minutes drive to 280 or 101 freeways for a quick commute to the Valley.
The financial district is ten minutes away, and many private and tech bus routes are nearby.
First-month rent and a security deposit of two months' rent.
The lease is for one year, but the term is fully negotiable.
Thank you for reading this posting.
Your average monthly rent is reduced to $8,999, with the first month RENT FREE.
If you would like to schedule a private viewing, please reply by email to this posting, or call
